title: Product Landing Page
description: A responsive landing page with accessible components and a clean layout. Includes a lightweight design system and a component-driven structure.

title: Dashboard UI
description: A dashboard prototype featuring cards, charts placeholders, and keyboard-friendly navigation. Built mobile-first and optimized for clarity.

title: API Status Monitor
description: A small app that displays service status with filtering and detail views. Focused on sensible UX and readable code.
